user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
This is my first bareMinerals blush, and I am super pleasantly surprised! I typically have to stay away from their products because they often contain bismuth, which irritates my sensitive skin. The pan is small, but this stuff is pigmented. Blush is a staple of mine, and I feel like this will last me a long time. I don't wear foundation, so I have to touch this up once during the day if I want all day wear, but I imagine the staying power is better with a base. I have fair skin with neutral/cool undertones, so the color Call My Blush (pink mauve) is the obvious choice, but I love peachy blushes for spring/summer! I think this color would be flattering across a fairly large range of skin colors and undertones. I will definitely by purchasing other colors and repurchasing this color in the future.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Auburn', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_title: Can Fool Anyone That Blush Is Natural!
review_content:
All of the colors (not just That Peach Tho) are great blushes! I think they have a blush color for all skin types here. It’s so hard to find a blush now days that is not full of glitter/shimmer and still have a good amount of product and are good quality. This blush blends out so easily and it’s easy to pick up color. The texture is great and it last a long time. There is zero fallout in this blush and the packaging is very reliable (I would highly recommend to travelers if they want to feel safe carrying their blushes). It has a loud click you can really tell it’s secure. I have never had a blush I loved so much that I used it to the end and this was the first one to ever do that (note: I have used too faced, tarte, hourglass, nars, urban decay, and benefit blushes). The price you pay for the amount and quality is just perfect! It’s such a fantastic deal! The “That Peach Tho” is good for all year round and I love the Berry and Chocolate blushes for winter! They are drop dead gorgeous then! Seriously give these blushes a try, especially if you have been looking for non shimmery ones! They aren’t so matte that it looks cakey like some matte blushes can look (because they aren’t considered matte). Also, because they aren’t shimmery, they blend extremely well and look like your real, natural blush. If you were to do a no-makeup makeup look, these blushes would really fool others into believing these colors are your true cheek colors.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
I really like this blush as it has the perfect pink tone for neutral/light skin. I needed a matte blush (highlighters show too much texture on my skin) that gave me a warm pop of color. Call My Blush is the perfect blush to do that. I use a technique that I saw on YouTube where you apply the blush in a circular motion going onto and over the eye. I make sure I don't have too much blush on the brush as it is quite pigmented. I layer in this circular motion until I have the color I want then swipe over the cheekbone for extra color in that area. I then apply Hourglass Ambient Diffused Light on top of the blush using the same circular motion to bring some brightness to my face and eye area. This doesn't bring out the texture in my mature skin and it really looks beautiful for a daily routine.

review_title: Best blush to be used in Fall
review_content: This berry wine color looks perfect on my cheeks! I nearly wear it everyday

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: The most pigmented, blurring, bendable blush on the market! I am a makeup artist and have purchased every single color for my kit. Absolutely stunning !!!!!!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: My go to summer-fall blush!!! This color is perfect (that peach tho) and the formula is very good. It’s not too pigmented so it’s a buildable blush which I prefer.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I am very fair skinned so it’s difficult for me to find a blush that works for me. This gives me a nice glow without being too much. It applies beautifully whatever brush I use. I reach for this more than all my other blushes

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Best natural peach blush for sensitive acne prone skin!!! This blush lasts all night (12+ hours) and it doesn’t break me out and I have super sensitive skin! Hit pan and already ordered a back up :) You need this blush in your life. Not shimmery and not super matte. The perfect blush for people with oily skin!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Beautiful blush. It gives a natural effect, easy to apply and blend in a few seconds. This color is perfect to give me a healthy look without emphasize the redness on my skin.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I love this blush. It goes on very light, so you can't overapply, which is helpful to me since I'm not great at applying blush. It was the perfect blush to complement the summer tan I had, and gave a nice natural glow.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_title: Never going back to drugstore blushes
review_content: I have bought drugstore blushes my whole life because I always thought blushes were one of those things you could "save" instead of "splurge" on. But only until I bought this!! Not only is the color just perfect for that barely flushed look, it's easily build-able and looks SO natural on the skin. After using this, no other drugstore product has stacked up. Love it!!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_title: Peach color is great for olive skin tones
review_content: This is my new daily blush. The peach color looks natural — not too orange or pinky — on my olive skin tone. It lasts throughout the day for me without getting patchy. It blends nicely with my real techniques blush brush.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: I was very disappointed that the colour was anything but delicate pink or mauve for that matter. Definitely is a coral in person so I'd recommend going into a store to colour match!

user_specs: ['Age 35-44', 'Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Beautiful natural looking blush. I had been looking forever for this type of blush!!!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: This blush is fantastic. It’s longwearing and natural looking. I bought it in the shade, “Pink me Up.” This shade is great for typically fairer skin, like me. I definitely would buy again in the same shade.

user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I will never buy another blush. Absolutely in love!!!

user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I love these so much I went back to buy two more! I have 3 and I need to limit myself lol, but if I was a rich witch I would buy them all just for the formula. It doesn't matter what color you get, it blends into your skin just like a natural flush of color. Gorgeous!!!!!
